mapper.select: select * from scrollbar where (id = (select max(id) from scrollbar)) or (id = (select max(id) from scrollbar) - 1) or (id = (select max(id) from scrollbar) - 2) or (id = (select max(id) from scrollbar) - 3) or (id = (select max(id) from scrollbar) - 4) or (id = (select max(id) from scrollbar)-5)
